summary.span: 表示二维空间中的 x 坐标和 y 坐标对。

span.span: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

summary.span: 还可以表示某些属性用法的逻辑点。

span.span: Can also represent a logical point for certain property usages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这表示 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 结构的 .NET 投影 `Point` 。This represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `Point` struct. 有关详细信息，请参阅 UWP API 参考中的 [点](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.foundation.point) 。For more information, see [Point](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.foundation.point) in the UWP API reference.
